document.full_text: u.s. aid contractor alan gross has been sentenced to 15 years in prison for crimes against the cuban state, state-run television reported on saturday, in the latest setback to relations between two cold war enemies.
document.title: u.s. contractor sentenced to 15 years in cuba trial
lines_and_colors: u.s. aid contractor alan gross has been sentenced to 15 years in prison for crimes against the cuban state, state-run television reported on saturday, in the latest setback to relations between two cold war enemies.
